# Todoist::Collaborator

## Properties

| Name | Type | Description | Notes |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- | ----- |
| **id** | **String** | The user&#39;s ID |  |
| **name** | **String** | The user&#39;s full name |  |
| **email** | **String** | The user&#39;s email address |  |

## Example

```ruby
require 'todoist'

instance = Todoist::Collaborator.new(
  id: null,
  name: null,
  email: null
)
```
